title: Context-Based Second Language Grammar Instruction Design: Integrated CAL and TBL Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second language communication skills and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Program strengthening second-language grammar education linked to mathematics curriculum for current elementary teachers

learning_goals: Learners implement appropriate use of target grammar with over 85% accuracy in digital scenarios reflecting real classroom situations
Learners demonstrate collaborative skills where the difference between peer and self-evaluation converges within 10% through TBL task performance
Learners record grammar application cases at least six times and write reflection journals in the LMS portfolio system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
